titleStmt.title: Christs communion with his church militant First preached, and now published, for the good of Gods church in generall. By Nicholas Lockyer, Mr. of Arts.
titleStmt.author: Lockyer, Nicholas, 1611-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E. G[riffin] for Iohn Rothwell, at the Sunne in S. Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Trinity College (Dublin, Ireland). Library.
